nodes.text: Battle at the m'Yalfor'ac Order battle arena

A battle erupted at a traditional m'Yalfor'ac Order battle arena on the planet Guiteica when, following an unsuccessful assassination attempt by Bitthævrian Major Jael Ganton Farvash against Colonel Quaal Tavier Catharius, the two fought a duel there. The victory of Tavier and his bodyguard, Aul Tarrus Vishav, over Ganton during the battle secured the status of the former pair as heroes among the Bitthævrian species.
